stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during his or her last turn. Trace 2 If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware with an install cost equal to or less than the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.
text:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during his or her last turn.
<trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware with an install cost equal to or less than the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.
title: Power Grid Overload
